Setting Type

21 Feb 2018

Setting Type was my fourth project in DES 209 - Fundamentals of Typography. The goal of the project was to organize the required information—a sport from the XXIII Winter Olympic Games, 150+ words of text, the date and location of the Olympic Games, and at least three athletes from your chosen sport—on an 8 ×10 inch composition.

N. Em. In. M. Db.
© Jacob Elias 2018

Setting Type

21 Feb 2018

Setting Type was my fourth project in DES 209 - Fundamentals of Typography. The goal of the project was to organize the required information—a sport from the XXIII Winter Olympic Games, 150+ words of text, the date and location of the Olympic Games, and at least three athletes from your chosen sport—on an 8 ×10 inch composition.
